Package subsystem.interbank.creditCard

Class CreditCard

java.lang.Object
subsystem.interbank.creditCard.CreditCard
public class CreditCard extends Object
The CreditCard class represents a credit card with various attributes such as cardholder name, card number, balance, expiration date, and security code. It provides methods to access and modify credit card information.

    • CreditCard

      public CreditCard(Integer creditCardId, String cardholderName, String cardNumber, String issuingBank, Double balance, Timestamp expirationDate, String securityCode)
      Constructs a new CreditCard instance with the given details.
      Parameters:
      creditCardId - The unique identifier for the credit card.
      cardholderName - The name of the cardholder.
      cardNumber - The credit card number.
      issuingBank - The bank that issued the credit card.
      balance - The current balance on the credit card.
      expirationDate - The expiration date of the credit card.
      securityCode - The security code of the credit card.
